question: Sophie has 13 jars of icing in her kitchen cabinet. Each jar of icing can decorate 15 muffins. Sophie wants to bake enough muffins to use up all of her icing. If each baking sheet holds 15 muffins, how many baking sheets worth of muffins should she bake?
answer:
She has enough icing for 13 * 15 = <<13*15=195>>195 muffins.
She needs 195 / 15 = <<195/15=13>>13 baking sheets to bake all of the muffins.
#### 13
